This site contains references to resources that were noted in the slides or discussed during the lecture. ## Slides The slides of the lecture are not included here, but it is strongly recommended to look at the 6-slide summary that is available [here](). The next sections are organized along the lines of these slides.

View all slides in new window Download PDF of all slides

View the [R Markdown source for the slides at GitHub](https://github.com/andrewheiss/talks/tree/master/2022-03-22_uga-putting-everything-out-there). ## Competition When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this: ```{r} 1 + 1 ``` You can add options to executable code like this ```{r} #| echo: false 2 * 2 ``` The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed). ## Regulation - [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/) - [ORCID](https://orcid.org/) - [Institutional directory](https://aysps.gsu.edu/profile/andrew-heiss/) - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/) ## Incentives Build your own website with one of these free services: - [Google Sites](https://sites.google.com/) - [WordPress](https://wordpress.com/) - [Wix](https://www.wix.com/) - [Weebly](https://www.weebly.com/) More control: - [Netlify Drop](https://app.netlify.com/drop) (or the [full Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/)) - [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) - Completely self-hosted - [DigitalOcean](https://www.digitalocean.com/) - [Installing the Apache Web Server on a DigitalOcean server](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-the-apache-web-server-on-ubuntu-18-04) Example pages: - [Suparna Chaudhry](http://www.suparnachaudhry.com/) (Google Sites + custom domain name) - [John Holbein](https://sites.google.com/site/johnbholbein/) (Google Sites + default domain name) - [Devon Cantwell](https://www.devoncantwell.com/) (Squarespace) - [Joannie Tremblay-Boire](http://joannieboire.weebly.com/) (Weebly) - [Scott Cowley](http://www.scottcowley.com/) (WordPress) - [Julia Silge](https://juliasilge.com/) (R Markdown + blogdown + [Hugo Academic](https://wowchemy.com/) + self-hosted) Domain names: - Best registrar I've found: [iwantmyname.com](https://iwantmyname.com/) ## Behavior - [SocArXiv](https://socopen.org/) ## Effects - [BIB REF](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10198-022-01457-7) - @van_de_ven_goal_2022
